## Auto-regressive Models

```{r}
library(ggfortify)
set.seed(2023)
n = 100000
y = rep(0, n)
y[1] = 0
b0 = 0
b1 = 1.0001
e = rnorm(n, sd = 1)
for (t in 2:n)
{
  y[t] = b0 + b1*y[t-1]+e[t]
}
autoplot(ts(y)) + ggtitle(paste0("An Autoregressive series with beta1 = ",b1))

```

# AR(p) and PACF

```{r}
yt <- arima.sim(list(order=c(4,0,0), ar=c(.1, .3, .2, .2)), n=10000)
b0 = 10
yt <- yt + b0
plot(yt)
pacf(yt)

```



```{r}
yt <- arima.sim(list(order=c(5,0,0), ar=c(.1, .3, .2, .1, .1)), n=10000)
b0 = 10
yt <- yt + b0
plot(yt)
pacf(yt)

```
